00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit_solver_cg2__
00021 #define __surfit_solver_cg2__
00022 
00023 #include <algorithm>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include "vec.h"
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 namespace surfit {
00031 
00032 template <class M, class V>
00033 vec * cg2(M * A, V * b, int max_it, REAL tol, vec *& X) {
00034 
00035         int flag = 0;                                // initialization
00036         int iter = 0;
00037         
00038         vec * x = NULL;
00039         if (!X) {
00040                 x = new vec(b->size());
00041                 int cnt;
00042                 for (cnt = 0; cnt < b->size(); cnt++) {
00043                         (*x)(cnt) = (*b)(cnt);
00044                 };
00045         }
00046         else 
00047         {
00048                 x = X;
00049                 X = NULL;
00050         }
00051 
00052         vec * r = new vec(b->size());
00053         vec * temp = new vec(b->size());
00054 
00055         // b = A*b
00056         A->mult_transposed(b,r);
00057         *b = *r;
00058 
00059         REAL bnrm2 = norm2( b );
00060         if  ( bnrm2 == REAL(0) )
00061                 bnrm2 = REAL(1); 
00062 
00063         // r = b - A*A*x;
00064         A->mult(x,temp);
00065         A->mult_transposed(temp,r);
00066         int r_cnt;
00067         REAL error_norm = bnrm2;        
00068         REAL error = 0;
00069         for (r_cnt = 0; r_cnt < r->size(); r_cnt++) {
00070                 (*r)(r_cnt) = (*b)(r_cnt) - (*r)(r_cnt);
00071                 error = MAX(error, fabs((*r)(r_cnt)) );
00072         }
00073         error = error/bnrm2;
00075 
00076         if ( error < tol ) {
00077                 delete r;
00078                 delete temp;
00079                 return x;
00080         }
00081         
00082         vec * p = new vec(b->size());
00083         for (r_cnt = 0; r_cnt < r->size(); r_cnt++) {
00084                 (*p)(r_cnt) = (*r)(r_cnt);
00085         }
00086 
00087         vec * q = new vec(b->size());
00088         
00089         REAL rho_1, rho, beta;
00090         rho = REAL(0);
00091 
00092         error_norm = norm2(x, undef_value);
00093         
00094         for (iter = 1; iter <= max_it; iter++) {    // begin iteration
00095                 
00096                 rho_1 = rho;
00097                 rho = times(r,r); 
00098                 
00099                 if ( iter > 1 ) {                        // direction vector
00100                         beta = rho / rho_1;
00101                         // p = beta*p;
00102                         vec::iterator p_it;
00103                         vec::const_iterator r_it;
00104                         for (p_it = p->begin(), r_it = r->begin(); p_it != p->end(); ++p_it, ++r_it) 
00105                                 *p_it = *r_it + *p_it * beta;
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 A->mult(p,temp);
00110                 A->mult_transposed(temp,q);
00111         
00112                 REAL times_pq = times(p,q);
00113                 REAL alpha = 0;
00114                 if (fabs(times_pq) > MIN(1e-4,tol))
00115                         alpha = rho / times_pq;
00116 
00117                 if (alpha == 0) {
00118                         bool stop = true;
00119                 }
00120 
00121 
00122                 error = 0;
00123                                 
00124                 // x = x + alpha * p;                    // update approximation vector
00125                 vec::iterator x_it;
00126                 vec::const_iterator p_it;
00127                 for (x_it = x->begin(), p_it = p->begin(); x_it != x->end(); ++x_it, ++p_it) {
00128                         if (*x_it == undef_value)
00129                                 continue;
00130                         *x_it = *x_it + alpha * *p_it;
00131                         error = MAX(error, fabs(alpha * *p_it));
00132                 }
00134 
00135                 // REAL Error = norm2( r ) / bnrm2;      // check convergence
00136                 error = error/error_norm;
00137                 if (error_norm == 0)
00138                         error = 0;
00139                 
00140                 if ( error <= tol )
00141                         break;
00142                 
00143                 // r = r - alpha * q;                    // compute residual
00144                 vec::iterator r_it;
00145                 vec::const_iterator q_it;
00146                 for (r_it = r->begin(), q_it = q->begin(); r_it != r->end(); ++r_it, ++q_it) {
00147                         *r_it = *r_it - alpha * *q_it;
00148                 }
00150                 
00151         }
00152         
00153         if ( error > tol ) 
00154                 flag = 1;                                // no convergence
00155                 
00156         delete p;
00157         delete q;
00158         delete r;
00159         delete temp;
00160 
00161         writelog(SURFIT_MESSAGE,"cg2: (%d)\terror : %12.6G iter : %d",x->size(), error, iter);
00162 
00163         return x;
00164 
00165 };
00166 
00167 }; // namespace surfit;
00168 
00169 #endif
00170


surfit-1.0.0pre
